mapper.insert: INSERT INTO push (push_id, push_type, ref_id, push_date, read, receiver_id, cmt_count, deleted) VALUES (seq_push_id.NEXTVAL, #{pushType}, #{refId}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 'F', #{receiverId}, 1, 'F' )
mapper.select: SELECT push_id, push_type FROM push WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND p.deleted='F'
mapper.sql: SELECT p.push_id, p.push_type, p.ref_id, p.push_date, p.read, p.cmt_count FROM push p WHERE p.receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND p.deleted='F' ORDER BY push_date DESC
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_name FROM push p, post b WHERE p.ref_id = b.post_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT b.board_name FROM push p, comments c1, comments pc, post b WHERE p.ref_id = c1.cmt_id AND c1.parent_cmt_id = pc.cmt_id AND pc.post_id = b.post_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT b.post_title title FROM push p, post b WHERE p.ref_id = b.post_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT c2.cmt_content title FROM push p, comments c1, comments c2 WHERE p.ref_id = c1.parent_cmt_id AND c1.parent_cmt_id = c2.cmt_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT pl.plan_title title FROM push p, plan pl WHERE p.ref_id = pl.plan_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT b.post_title title FROM push p, post b WHERE p.ref_id = b.post_id AND p.push_id = #{pushId}
SELECT count(*) FROM push WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND read = 'F' AND deleted='F'
mapper.update: UPDATE push SET deleted = 'T', cmt_count = 0 WHERE push_id IN #{item}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
